misc: Always a gentleman despite occasionally losing his temper on the course
biography: Daniel, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, hails from Oulujokilaakson Golfklubi ry and stands as a testament to enduring participation. Over the years, Daniel has graced the fairways of this competition on seven occasions, securing the coveted Hector Trophée twice. Although the Victor trophy has eluded him so far, his presence is always noted, a mix of steely determination and jovial camaraderie.

While Daniel's competitive spirit burns bright, he is also known for maintaining a sportsmanlike attitude, even when the pressure mounts and his temper flares. A true gentleman of the sport, Daniel embodies the values of the Hector Trophée.

Although Daniel is not currently slated to compete in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, followers of the tournament know that the field may yet change. Regardless, the tournament will miss Daniel's presence.
Fans of the tournament will certainly be following Daniel's future endeavors closely.
